content: सरकः --कं [सृ --वुन्] {@--1@} A continuous line of road. {@--2@} Spirituous liquor, spirits. {@--3@} Drinking spirits; चक्रुरथ सह पुरंध्रि जनैरयथार्यसिद्धि सरकं महीभृतः <ls>Śi. 15. 80</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">10. 12.</ls> {@--4@} A drinking-vessel, wine-glass, goblet; <ls>Śi. 10. 20.</ls> {@--5@} Distribution of spirituous liquor. --कं {@--1@} Going. {@--2@} A pond, lake. {@--3@} Heaven.
